summary: Replaces Amren's Family Sword with a new Model.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://picload.org/image/iwdgclg/screenshot000.png[/img][/center][center][/center][center][img]https://picload.org/image/iwdgioc/divider.png[/img][/center]

[font=Garamond][color=#d8d8d8][size=5]Description:[/size][/color][/font]

As most of you know Amren's Family Sword was just a regular Iron Sword with the "unique" mark on it now i intended to change that
and made my own Variant of the Sword from Scratch(mesh, textures etc..)

Props to [url=http://www.gunetwork.org/u3429]AdvancedTerror[/url] and [url=http://www.gunetwork.org/u22175]Ashi Itachi[/url] from the Gunetwork Forum who basically made all the Screenshots, You guys are awesome! :D

Hope you like the Sword as much as i enjoyed making it Have Fun! :)

[font=Garamond][color=#d8d8d8][size=5]Install:[/size][/color][/font]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your Skyrim Data folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the Amren´s Family Sword Replacer.esp

[font=Garamond][color=#d8d8d8][size=5]Uninstall:[/size][/color][/font]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod


[center][img]https://picload.org/image/iwdgioc/divider.png[/img][/center]



Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without my permission. Have fun!
author: standalone09
